CSSScroll-padding-inline.summary: The scroll-padding-inline shorthand property sets the scroll padding of an element in the inline dimension.

remarks.para: The scroll-padding properties define offsets for the optimal viewing region of the scrollport: the region used as the target region for placing things in view of the user. This allows the author to exclude regions of the scrollport that are obscured by other content (such as fixed-positioned toolbars or sidebars) or to put more breathing room between a targeted element and the edges of the scrollport.
